title: UN agency to launch blockchain education, advisory programs for governments
summary: The United Nations is preparing to launch a blockchain academy for governments and a UN-led blockchain advisory group to assist countries in adopting the technology.

title: Crypto’s growth engine stalls as Wintermute warns of ‘recycled liquidity’
summary: Wintermute said inflows across stablecoins, ETFs and digital asset treasuries have plateaued, leaving crypto liquidity recycling internally.

title: Someone drained your exchange account? Here’s your emergency playbook
summary: When your crypto is stolen, a rapid and organized response is crucial to trace the funds and rebuild your digital security.

title: Regulators must protect the architecture of freedom
summary: The EU’s near-approval of Chat Control reveals regulatory threats to encryption. Web3 risks centralizing surveillance unless privacy becomes foundational.

title: Coinbase settles $24.7M fine in Ireland over transaction monitoring failures
summary: Coinbase said it had enhanced oversight and compliance testing after coding errors led to gaps in transaction monitoring between 2021 and 2022.

title: Banks push US Treasury for blanket stablecoin yield ban, Coinbase pushes back
summary: Coinbase insists that the US Treasury cannot override Congress’s intent on the GENIUS Act, but banks continue to press for a blanket ban on stablecoin interest.

title: Privacy coins surge 80%: Why Zcash and Dash are back in the spotlight
summary: Privacy coins surge 80% as Zcash and Dash hit multi-year highs, driven by rotation, halving hype and renewed demand for transaction privacy.

title: Spanish research institute to sell $10M Bitcoin stash bought for $10K in 2012
summary: Researchers bought 97 BTC in 2012 for a blockchain study. Thirteen years later, they’re selling the stash to fund quantum research projects.

title: Kalshi, Polymarket traders bet Supreme Court will curb Trump’s tariff powers
summary: Prediction markets show waning confidence in Trump’s tariff authority, with both Kalshi and Polymarket traders bracing for limits on executive power.

title: How to spot bull and bear market traps in crypto before they catch you
summary: Learn to spot fake breakouts in crypto using funding, OI and volume signals — and avoid bull and bear trap setups.
